item.title: Governing Artificial Intelligence in Conformity Assessment: The ISO/CASCO Perspective
item.description: ISO/CASCO standards now explicitly govern AI in conformity assessment, treating it as a technical resource requiring human oversight and validation, impacting AI-driven inspection systems.

item.title: Cognex Outlines AI-Driven Growth Strategy at Citi Global Conference
item.description: Cognex presented its growth strategy focusing on AI-driven penetration in packaging and semiconductor sectors, targeting a 25% EBITDA margin by 2026.

item.title: Supreme Court Ruling Limits Presidential Tariff Powers, Impacting Machine Vision Industry
item.description: The US Supreme Court ruled against the use of IEEPA for tariffs, requiring Congressional approval, which may reduce import costs for machine vision components like sensors and lenses.

item.title: Collaborative Robots and Digital Metrology Pioneering Factories of the Future
item.description: Tekniker collaborates with ZEISS and KUKA to demonstrate a new automated robotic metrology solution for high-precision in-line quality control.

item.title: INSPECTIS Launches New Ring Light With Dual White & UV Light
item.description: INSPECTIS launches a new dual-mode ring light for digital microscopes, enhancing detection of conformal coatings and contamination in electronics manufacturing.

item.title: Automated Optical Inspection System Market Size & Share Analysis
item.description: The Automated Optical Inspection (AOI) market is projected to grow to $6.5 billion by 2035, driven by rising electronics manufacturing automation and stringent quality assurance standards.

item.title: Breaking the Data Bottleneck: Synthetic Data Accelerates AI-Driven Quality Control
item.description: Zetamotion and other companies are advancing synthetic data generation to overcome data scarcity in AI training for automated inspection, accelerating the deployment of defect detection models.
